name: storeyed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a building) having a particular number of storeys (= levels): It's a normal two storeyed house. There is a single-storeyed extension on the back of the hotel. See
storey
More examplesFewer examplesIt was a large, tall, four storeyed building.The house is two-storeyed , with five tall windows and a central door.The hospital was an unimposing single storeyed, lengthy corridored building.
